title: Demand for Comfort Food Greases Market for All Things Fried
sub_head: Consumers crave  cheese curds, fried chicken and french fries; it ‘satisfies the inner self’
body:
Fried food is one of Americans’ oldest obsessions. The pandemic took that to a deeper level.
More people are ordering french fries with their fast food, and seeking solace in fried chicken, say food industry executives and nutritionists. Repairs of restaurants’ deep-fat fryers have doubled due to overuse. Nearly half of U.S. households now own air fryers. And there aren’t enough cheese curds to go around.
